00007 import adodb,adodb_odbc,sys
00008 
00009 if sys.platform.find('win32') >= 0:
00010     import mx.ODBC.Windows
00011     mxODBC = mx.ODBC.Windows
00012 else:
00013     import mx.ODBC.iODBC
00014     mxODBC = mx.ODBC.iODBC
00015     
00016 try:
00017     True, False
00018 except NameError:
00019     # Maintain compatibility with Python 2.2
00020     True, False = 1, 0
00021 
00022 class adodb_mxodbc(adodb.ADOConnection):
00023     databaseType = 'mxodbc'
00024     dataProvider = 'mxodbc'
00025     hasRowCount = False
00026 
00027     def __init__(self):
00028         pass
00029 
00030     def Module(self):
00031         global mxODBC
00032         
00033         return mxODBC
00034         #host=host1 user=user1 password=secret port=4341
00035     
00036     def _connect(self,host=None,user=None,password=None,database=None):
00037         global mxODBC
00038         
00039         if user == None and password == None and database == None:
00040             dsn = host
00041         else:
00042             dsn = 'dsn='+self.addq(host)+';'
00043             if (user != None): dsn += ' uid='+self.addq(user)+';'
00044             if (password != None): dsn += ' pwd='+self.addq(password)+';'
00045             if (database != None): dsn += ' database='+self.addq(database)+';'
00046       
00047         self._conn = mxODBC.DriverConnect(dsn)
00048         self._conn.setconnectoption(mxODBC.SQL.AUTOCOMMIT, mxODBC.SQL.AUTOCOMMIT_ON)
00049 
00050     def _newcursor(self,rs):
00051         return cursor_mxodbc(rs,self)
00052     
00053     def BeginTrans(self):
00054         global mxODBC
00055         if self._autocommit:
00056             self._autocommit = False
00057         self._conn.setconnectoption(mxODBC.SQL.AUTOCOMMIT, mxODBC.SQL.AUTOCOMMIT_OFF)
00058 
00059     def RollbackTrans(self):
00060         global mxODBC
00061         self._conn.rollback()
00062         self._autocommit = True
00063         self._conn.setconnectoption(mxODBC.SQL.AUTOCOMMIT, mxODBC.SQL.AUTOCOMMIT_ON)
00064         
00065     def CommitTrans(self):
00066         global mxODBC
00067         self._conn.commit()
00068         self._autocommit = True
00069         self._conn.setconnectoption(mxODBC.SQL.AUTOCOMMIT, mxODBC.SQL.AUTOCOMMIT_ON)
00070 
00071     def MetaColumns(self, table):
00072         curs = self._conn.cursor()
00073         curs.columns(None, None, table) # columns('%', '%', table) ?
00074         rs = self._newcursor(curs)
00075         arr = []
00076         table = table.upper()
00077         while not rs.EOF:
00078             if rs.fields[2].upper() == table:
00079                 arr.append((rs.fields[3],rs.fields[5],rs.fields[6]))
00080             rs.MoveNext()
00081         return arr
00082     
00083 class cursor_mxodbc(adodb.ADOCursor):
00084     def __init__(self,rs,conn):
00085         adodb.ADOCursor.__init__(self,rs,conn)
00086         rs.arraysize=10
00087
